RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALENTINE GIFT showed good speed, disputed the pace on the inside of a foe, vied along the rail on the turn, dueled inside of a rival in upper stretch, shook clear coming to the sixteenth-pole and proved best under steady urging. HANDLE ON YOU chased the leading duo on the outside then in the four path on the turn, pursued the leaders under a drive into the final sixteenth and narrowly earned the place while no match for the winner. CALL HER BLUFF bumped solidly with a rival at the start, was urged along on the outside, went six wide on the turn, chased the leaders under a drive into the final sixteenth and just missed the place. DUSK contested the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, dueled outside of the winner into the final furlong, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened. LU'S REDEMPTION moved out while urged along well off the pace, went four then five wide on the turn and lacked the needed response. MIA NIPOTINA bumped soundly with a rival at the start, dropped back on the far outside while void of speed, angled in late on the backstretch, went three then two wide on the turn and failed to threaten. CITY BLOCKS bobbled at the start, was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn and came up empty. ALETTE D'ORO was last to commence, raced near the back, moved from the rail to the three path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and was no factor. BELLS TOLLING was ridden along off the pace, went five then four wide on the turn and failed to respond. BARONESS BOURBON was urged along off the pace, raced in the two path while between horses early on the turn, was crowded when a foe crossed in front near the seven-sixteenths, moved to the three path before the five-sixteenths and also failed to respond. LEARNING TO FLY was coaxed along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, steadied while in tight against the rail near the seven-sixteenths and capitulated. CARA'S GIRL bumped solidly with foes on both sides at the start, went five wide on the turn, dropped back at the five-sixteenths and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Lu's Redemption
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: well off pace,moved out,4-5wide turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Valentine Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside foe,rail turn,responded,dueled,clear1/16,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Dusk
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Barber, Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside pace,3path turn,dueled,weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Learning to Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along,ins turn,steadied 7/16,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Alette d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,well back,ins-3path turn,4w1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Baroness Bourbon
ENTRY.OWNER: Bourbon Lane Stable (J Hill M McMahon) Begg James Bentley Saratoga Winners Stavr
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,2p7/16,in tight,3path5/16,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Handle On You
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio, Michael and Nassau CC Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duo outside,4path turn,no match,earned place

ENTRY.NAME: City Blocks
ENTRY.OWNER: J and M Racing Stables Rosen Scott and Driscoll James P
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,urged along,3wide turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Bells Tolling
ENTRY.OWNER: Brogden Carrie L and Rankin Troy
ENTRY.COMMENT: ridden along,5-4wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Nipotina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,no speed,mvd in 1/2,3-2path turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Cara's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,urged,5w turn,drop back5/16,faltered,eased,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Call Her Bluff
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R Flying Zee Racing Stables LLC and LaBelle Tracey L
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urged outside,6wide turn,no match,lost 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEA STREAK bobbled at the break recovering inwards and forcing SKIP THE LINE to shy in briefly before being steadied when squeezed out, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking four wide through the turn coming under coaxing just past the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, closed well outside to overthrow the front inside the eighth pole, then drew clear to the finish getting geared down in the final jumps. WAJDA broke in at the start and was corrected, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive tussling with CHANGE OF COMMAND through to the finish running on to best that rival for the place honors. CHANGE OF COMMAND five to six paths off the inside in pursuit from just off the pace, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take narrow command nearing the eighth pole, got overhauled inside that station and fought on with the aforementioned rival to the finish and was along safe for the show honors. REASONED ANALYSIS got bumped askew at the start by SKIP THE LINE coming inwards in reaction to the tightening of his lane by SEA STREAK, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. LIVEHAPPY coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in taking narrow and brief command with three-sixteenths to go before being headed by CHANGE OF COMMAND nearing the eighth pole, then weakened in the late stages. RATHMORE coaxed from the start, chased three wide in closest aim of the leader before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took over command and took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, got displaced from the front at the three-sixteenths and weakened in the final furlong. SKIP THE LINE shied in bumping REASONED ANALYSIS and then got steadied when squeezed out at the break due to press from SEA STREAK, chased seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn, went six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. STATES UNITED coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and offered no response. ELECTRIC EEL coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. GUM ISLAND coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. THUNDERSLAM shied in at the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, swung three wide for home, made no impact. MAXIMILLIONS DREAM coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, yielded the front and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then folded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Gum Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Electric Eel
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Maximillions Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, yielded, 2w 1/4p, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Rathmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3w early, ins turn, up near 1/4, headed 3/16, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Livehappy
ENTRY.OWNER: A P Stable and Fox Tale Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, up 3/16, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Change of Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, up 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderslam
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Wajda
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: States United
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Reasoned Analysis
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Skip the Line
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and Louis Lazzinnaro LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed, steady st, 7w early, 4w turn, 6w uppr, passed tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sea Streak
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, 6w backstretch, 4w turn, 7w upper, up ins 1/8, drew cl

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Vosburgh S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 111. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CODY'S WISH was off slow and spotted the front several lengths, moved up on the outside under urging, vied in the three path on the turn, took the lead at the quarter-pole, fought outside of the runner-up into the final sixteenth then moved clear while best. ACCRETIVE showed speed then set the pace, vied in the two path on the turn, was asked under threat at the five-sixteenths, lost the lead at the quarter-pole, fought on well inside of the winner into the final sixteenth then was outfinished while clear for the place. GREAT NAVIGATOR leaned in at the start, was well placed just off the pace on the inside, saved ground while asked on the turn, made a bid at the quarter-pole, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. SHERIFF BIANCO moved out early then stalked the pace, shifted further out leaving the backstretch, chased three wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and tired. HIGH OAK was coaxed along at the rear, moved in near the half-mile pole, was roused in the two path on the turn and failed to rally. COWAN was rated off the pace, moved out near the half-mile pole, was asked four wide on the turn, chased six wide into the stretch and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Great Navigator
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned in brk,well placed,asked rail turn,chsd,bid1/4,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Cowan
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off pace,mvd out 1/2,asked 4wide turn,6w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sheriff Bianco
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out,stalked,mvd out 1/2,chased 3path turn,5w1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Accretive
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace,2path turn,asked5/16,headed1/4,outfinished late

ENTRY.NAME: High Oak
ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed at rear,mvd in 1/2,2path turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cody's Wish
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,mvd up outside,vied 3path turn,lead1/4,edged clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim OtherwiseC laim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWIFTSURE established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and was set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat from the runner up to the outside and gamely fended off that rival to rebuff the challenge to the finish. FULL SCREEN chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, dug in latched on to the outside of the top one through to the finish but was repelled to the end. BOLD ENDEAVOR coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. BOURBON CALLING chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. GUNTOWN chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened. ANTIGRAVITY three wide in pursuit, got coaxed along at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, tired. CAZADERO chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired. OUTLIER coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Cazadero
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Endeavor
ENTRY.OWNER: Winning Move Stable and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Full Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, dug in, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Outlier
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Calling
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Antigravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Swiftsure
ENTRY.OWNER: Liberty House Racing Twenty-Two Stable Club Sixty Five Racing Take a Shot Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, set down 2w 1/4p, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Guntown
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Gallant Bloom S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 104. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. . By subscription of $250 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,250 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,250 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $1,250 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided as follows: $137,500 to the owner of the winner, $50,000 to second, $30,000 to third, $15,000 to fourth, $10,000 to fift h and $7,500 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights, three year olds, 122 lbs. Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners of a Grade One in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning ow ner. Closed Saturday, September 16, 2023 with 18 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STERLING SILVER settled off the pace, went three then four wide on the turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, came inward while closing ground near the eighth-pole, took the lead outside the sixteenth-pole then drew away under steady handling. HEADLAND went to the front, angled in outside the five-eighths, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked for her best in upper stretch, came out inside the furlong marker then was overtaken by the winner and proved no match. CARAMEL SWIRL was away alertly, settled on the inside, was roused near the five-sixteenths, moved out in upper stretch, chased into the final furlong, checked between foes outside the sixteenth-pole and lost momentum then secured the unofficial show position. BEGUINE brushed the outside of the gate then bumped lightly with a foe after the start, tracked the pace, saved ground on the turn, shifted three wide while asked at the quarter-pole, chased in upper stretch, steadied between foes at the furlong marker and weakened. UNDERVALUED ASSET made light contract with a foe after the start, was rated off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, moved out while put to a drive in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. REMAIN ANONYMOUS moved outside the pacesetter outside the five-eighths then stalked on the outside, went three wide on the turn, was given her cue near the five-sixteenths, chased four wide into the stretch then moved further out and came up empty. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY, STERLING SILVER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST AND PLACED SECOND FOR INTERFERENCE INSIDE THE FURLONG MARKER. HEADLAND WAS ALSO DISQUALIFIED AND MOVED FROM SECOND AND PLACED THIRD FOR INTERFERENC NEAR THE SAME JUNCTURE.

ENTRY.NAME: Caramel Swirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,settled,ins turn,mvd out3/16,checked out1/16,earn3rd

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Sterling Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,3-4w turn,5w1/4,rallied,came in1/8,lead outside1/16,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Undervalued Asset
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump after brk,rated,2p turn,mvd out 3/16,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Beguine
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd gate,light bump trckd,ins turn,3p1/4,stdied1/8,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Remain Anonymous
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan and Casal Jorge
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out 5-1/2,stlkd outside,3w turn,ask5/16,4w1/4,mvd out,empty

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Headland
ENTRY.OWNER: Brockley Thomas and Brockley Daryn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,mvd in,pace,2p turn,responded,came out ins1/8,overtkn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Woodward S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 113. Stakes Purse 400000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $400 each which should accompany the nomination; $2,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $2,000 to star t. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing time of entries. The purse to be divided as follows: $220,000 to the owner of the winner, $80, 000 to second, $48,000 to third, $24,000 to fourth, $16,000 to fifth and $12,000 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight: Three year olds 122 lbs. Older 126 lbs. Non-winners a Grade One at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a Graded sweepstake at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 4 lbs. The Estate of Mrs. William Woodward, Sr. to add the Woodward Challenge Cup, to be won three times, not necessarily consecutively, by the same owner before becoming his or her property. The owner of thew
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZANDON went three wide early on the first turn then was carried to the five path, was taken up while bumping with a foe midway through that bend, settled off the pace, was urged three wide on the far turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, closed strongly to get the lead inside the furlong marker then drew away under steady handling. FILM STAR raced in the three path on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the far turn, took the lead coming to the quarter-pole, led under a drive into the final furlong then was overtaken by the winner and proved no match while just able to get the place. LAW PROFESSOR tossed his head while lugging out from the two path to the four path early on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the four path on the far turn, pursued the leader under a drive into the final furlong and just missed the place. CHARGE IT was hustled from the gate, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, was well placed down the backstretch, passed the half-mile pole under urging, chased in the two path on the far turn, had the rider lose his crop outside the furlong marker and lacked the needed kick. O'CONNOR (CHI) was restless in the gate, broke a bit slow, angled in at the rear, saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear, moved from the rail to the three path on the far turn and gained ground but failed to threaten. TYSON was carried from the four path to the six path early on the first turn then bumped with a rival, settled on the far outside, was urged five wide on the far turn, spun six wide into the stretch, remained on his inside lead in the drive and came up empty. COSTA TERRA dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along while saving ground on the far turn and failed to threaten. PIPELINE went to the front, traveled around the opening bend in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked while inside on the far turn, lost the lead at the quarter-pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Charge It
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ins-2p1st,well placed,chsd 2p2nd trn,lost crop1/8,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Law Professor
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged out 2-4p1st turn,trckd out,chsd 4p2nd turn,miss2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Zandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-5w1st,bmpd6-1/2,tkn up,settled,urged 3w2nd,5w1/4,rallied,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Pipeline
ENTRY.OWNER: Gunther, John D. and Eurowest Bloodstock Services
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,2p1st,pace,ins2nd turn,headed1/4,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Costa Terra
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2path-ins1st,settled,urged rail 2nd turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Tyson
ENTRY.OWNER: Hill 'n' Dale Equine Holdings Inc (J G Sikura) and Stretch Run Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-6w1st,bmpd7-1/2,settled out,urged 5w2nd turn,6w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: O'Connor (CHI)
ENTRY.OWNER: Iavarone Michael Iavarone Julia C and Ode Fernando Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless,off bit slw,mvd in,ins1st,at rear,ins-3w2nd,6w,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,stlkd outside,ask3p2nd,lead1/4,led past1/8,overtaken

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of MEY

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALLALOO broke in at the start and was corrected, vied four wide with a trio briefly before giving chase four then three wide through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive taking command a furlong out, battled between flanking challengers to the finish clinging to command gamely and prevailed by a neck at the end. QUICK TO ACCUSE vied from the six path briefly before chasing four then three wide, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive offering up a mild kick but was ultimately rebuffed at the end. LOCKE AND KEY chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors well clear of the rest. BE THE BOSS stumbled at the start, recovered to vie from the three path with a trio before emerging with sole command tucked to the two path half a mile from home, showed the way through the turn and went three wide into upper stretch, dug in under challenge and yielded nearing the eighth pole, then weakened in the final furlong. TWO FOR CHARGING chased four wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, offered no response. ROCKET AND ROLL five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn, got set down spinning six wide into upper stretch and weakened. ALWAYS CHARMING hustled from the gate, chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. HENSON vied from the two path early on, tucked inside in the midst of being shaken off half a mile from home, retreated along the rail through the turn, went two to three wide into upper stretch and folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Henson
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p, to ins 1/2, retreated, 2-3w upper, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Be the Boss
ENTRY.OWNER: Nice Guys Stables Oringer Jay Al Bianchi Racing LLC and Hornstock Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, vied 3w, shook away 2p 1/2, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Locke and Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 2p 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Two for Charging
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, angled 7w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Always Charming
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Callaloo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, vied 4w briefly, 3w turn, 4w upper, up 1/8, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Quick to Accuse
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied briefly 6p, chased 4-3w, 4-5w upper, mild kick, rebuffed

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket and Roll
ENTRY.OWNER: Spendthrift Farm LLC and Frank Fletcher Racing Operations Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 4w turn, set down 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race wil l be run at One Mile on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VINO ROUGE came inward at the start, showed speed then dropped just off the pace, was asked along the rail on the turn, chased under a drive into the final sixteenth, gained on the tiring leader late and got up under strong urging to prevail. SENSING FLATTER bumped lightly with a foe at the start, settled off the pace, was urged two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch, chased outside into the final furlong, gained on the tiring pacesetter late and got up for the place. PARADISE LANE showed speed then set the pace, vied in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked for her best in upper stretch, held a clear lead while shortening stride into the final sixteenth but was caught while able to hold the show. MATURITY DATE made light contact with an opponent at the start, tracked the pace on the outside then three wide on the turn, was asked inside the five-sixteenths, chased under a drive in the stretch and was out-kicked. DAY AWAY stumbled at the start but came out in front, settled on the outside, dropped back four wide on the turn and faltered. CLASSIC CARA broke in at the start, dropped towards the rear then fell back further late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,drop back,fell back 1/2,inside turn,outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Vino Rouge
ENTRY.OWNER: Harold Lerner LLC and Team D
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,just off pace,ask rail turn,chased past1/16,gained,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,came out in front,settled,urged 4w turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sensing Flatter
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,settled,urged 2-3p turn,4p1/4,chsd,gain late,missd

ENTRY.NAME: Maturity Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild bmp brk,tracked outside,3wide turn,ask5/16,chased,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Paradise Lane
ENTRY.OWNER: Bushnell Emily Bushnell Oliver Wygod Martin J and Wygod Pam
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace,2path turn,clear past 1/16,caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEETEST PRINCESS six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide into the turn and advanced on the front to take over command just inside the three-eighths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive to prevail. SAIL WITH THE WIND got bumped at the start by SARATOGA KISSES due to pressure from DREAM ROAD, chased five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. SARATOGA KISSES got bumped at the start by DREAM ROAD and in turn bumped SAIL WITH THE WIND, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to procure the show honors. DASHING DELLA five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch just off the top pair, tucked three wide and advanced to take over the front at the seven-sixteenths, got displaced from command just inside the three-eighths by the eventual winner, swung four wide for home and weakened in the late stages. DREAM ROAD broke in at the start bumping SARATOGA KISSES into SAIL WITH THE WIND, chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired. CAN'T FOOL ME stumbled at the start and was taken in hand conceding six to seven lengths to the front before being able to settle into stride, chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SWEETNESS led early on from the four path before dueling three wide briefly with DISRUPTION to her inside, got shaken off inside seven-sixteenths and chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home and tired. DISRUPTION forwardly placed just off the inside in the early going, advanced to duel with the aforementioned foe briefly down the backstretch before emerging with DASHING DELLA into the turn, got displaced from command with seven-sixteenths to go and came under coaxing midway on the turn, faded and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Disruption
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p early, dueled, led ins, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetness
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early 4-3w, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Can't Fool Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased ins, coaxed 7/16, 4-5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sail With the Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 5w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetest Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4w turn, up ins 3/8, 3-2w upper, drew clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Dashing Della
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo Giangrande Salvatore and Giangrande Stefano

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 11 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALLEY'S SONG brushed with a rival at the start, was urged along between horses, went five then four wide on the turn, gained to make a bid at the quarter-pole, battled outside the runner-up into the final furlong, took the advantage coming to the sixteenth-pole then moved clear late while best. SOL EMPERATRIZ pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the two to three path on the turn, took the lead passing the three-eighths, led under a drive until near the sixteenth-pole then was overtaken while clear for the place. NECESSARYANDPROPER brushed the inside of the gate at the start, set the pace under pressure to her outside, vied inside to the two path on the turn, lost the lead passing the three-eighths pole, dropped back into the stretch and weakened. POSEIDON'S MIST was urged along just off the pace, dropped back in the two path on the turn and came up empty. WISE CONVERSATION broke a bit awkwardly, dropped back while showing no speed then angled in, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. PERFECTLY MPERFECT brushed with a rival at the start, was urged along off the pace, went six then five wide on the turn and failed to respond. SONG OF SOLOMINI was last to commence, raced towards the back while ridden along, saved ground on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and was no factor. BANK ON BELLE was urged along off the pace, steadied briefly while in tight near the half-mile pole, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and had nothing left. MISS OMAHA bobbled at the start then was hustled, chased the pace, went three to four wide on the turn, dropped back fast late on that bend and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Bank On Belle
ENTRY.OWNER: Cotrone Robert and Rodriguez Rudy R
